lemma matrix_match_condn_2: "matrix_match A1 A2 B1 B2 \<and>((i<(row_length A1)*(row_length B1)) \<and>(j<(length A2)*(length B2))) \<Longrightarrow> ((A1 \<otimes> B1)\<circ>(A2 \<otimes> B2))!j!i = scalar_product (vec_vec_Tensor (row A1 (i div row_length B1)) (row B1 (i mod row_length B1))) (vec_vec_Tensor (col A2 (j div length B2)) (col B2 (j mod length B2)))"
